item.title: The Family From Canada
item.description: AS MY stay here at California nears its end, I find myself some time at my disposal to just sit back and look back for a while. I met a very wide array of people here, mostly at the Vikings bar where all these oldie bikers show up. Its an old school American bar, and people are friendly. Some master pool players show up sometimes, and my friend Benjamin helped me pick up the basics of the game.
